TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CustomAttributeTypedArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示只反射上下文中的自定义特性的参数，或数组参数的元素。

span.span: Represents an argument of a custom attribute in the reflection-only context, or an element of an array argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能执行在仅反射上下文中检查的代码, 因此, 不一定总是可以通过创建自定义属性的实例, 然后使用、 等方法来检查它们的属性, 来检查它们的属性.Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果属性类型本身的代码加载到仅反射上下文中, 则无法执行该代码。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 类使用结构来提供对为自定义特性实例指定的位置参数的类型和值的访问, 而无需执行特性构造函数。 The structure is used by the class to provide access to the type and value of a positional argument specified for a custom attribute instance, without executing the attribute constructor. 它还提供对命名参数的类型和值的访问, 而无需执行自定义特性类型的相应属性的代码。It also provides access to the type and value of a named argument without executing the code of the corresponding property of the custom attribute type. 特性实例的所有位置和命名参数的类型和值都由结构提供。The types and values of all the positional and named arguments of an attribute instance are provided by structures. 属性返回的位置属性由结构直接表示, 但由属性返回的命名参数由结构表示; 若要获取命名参数的结构, 使用属性。The positional attributes returned by the property are directly represented by structures, but the named arguments returned by the property are represented by structures; to get the structure for a named argument, use the property. 如果参数是值的数组 , 则表示参数的的属性将返回对象的泛型 。If an argument is an array of values, the property of the that represents the argument returns a generic of objects. 集合中的每个对象都表示数组的对应元素。Each object in the collection represents the corresponding element of the array. 若要创建类的实例, 请`static` 使用工厂方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` factory method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的, 并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的, 只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组, 一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时, 该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中, 并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性, 同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object value) cil managed

span.span: The value of the custom attribute argument.

summary.span: 使用指定的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的`null` `value`参数不能为, 因为参数类型是从的类型推断而来的。 `value`The `value` parameter cannot be `null` for this constructor, because the argument type is inferred from the type of `value`. 若要指定`null`值, 请使用构造函数。To specify a `null` value, use the constructor. 此构造函数供类的继承者使用。This constructor is for use by inheritors of the class. 它不应在应用程序代码中使用。It is not intended for use in application code.

span.span: is .

Public Sub New (argumentType As Type, value As Object)

The value of the custom attribute argument.

summary.span: 用指定的类型和值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数供类的继承者使用。This constructor is for use by inheritors of the class. 它不应在应用程序代码中使用。It is not intended for use in application code.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentType As Type
public: property Type ^ ArgumentType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取参数或数组参数元素的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the argument or of the array argument element.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示参数或数组元素的类型。

span.span: A object representing the type of the argument or of the array element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于简单参数或数组参数的元素, 此属性标识属性返回的值的实际类型。For simple arguments or for elements of array arguments, this property identifies the actual type of the value returned by the property. 对于数组参数, 此属性返回数组类型, 但属性返回一个`ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)`在 Visual Basic), 其中集合的每个元素都表示数组参数的对应元素。For array arguments, this property returns the array type, but the property returns a `ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)` in Visual Basic) in which each element of the collection represents the corresponding element of the array argument. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的, 并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的, 只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组, 一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时, 该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中, 并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性, 同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性`ShowValueOrArray`数据的方法中, 用于显示属性的类型。 The property is used in the `ShowValueOrArray` method that displays custom attribute data, to display the types of attributes. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回由参数名称、等号和字符串表示的参数值组成的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string consisting of the argument name, the equal sign, and a string representation of the argument value.

returns.span: 由参数名称、等号和字符串表示的参数值组成的字符串。

span.span: A string consisting of the argument name, the equal sign, and a string representation of the argument value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取简单参数或数组参数的元素的参数值；获取数组参数的值的集合。

span.span: Gets the value of the argument for a simple argument or for an element of an array argument; gets a collection of values for an array argument.

value.span: 一个表示参数或元素的值的对象，或表示数组类型参数的值的 对象的一个泛型 。

span.span: An object that represents the value of the argument or element, or a generic of objects that represent the values of an array-type argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果表示一个数组参数, 则此属性返回一个`ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)`在 Visual Basic 中)。 If the represents an array argument, this property returns a `ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)` in Visual Basic). 集合中的每个元素都表示数组参数的对应元素。Each element of the collection represents the corresponding element of the array argument. 可以通过使用属性来获取值的类型。The type of the value can be obtained by using the property. 获取简单参数或数组参数的元素的属性返回的值的实际类型。 gets the actual type of the value returned by the property for simple arguments or for elements of array arguments. 它返回数组自变量的数组类型。It returns the array type for array arguments. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的, 并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的, 只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组, 一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时, 该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中, 并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性, 同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性`ShowValueOrArray`数据的方法中, 用于显示属性的值。 The property is used in the `ShowValueOrArray` method that displays custom attribute data, to display the values of attributes.
